replies.author: Redstone_ray
replies.txt_content:
1. 启动flag使用G1GC或者装OpenJDK+OpenJ9:https://aikar.co/2018/07/02/tuni ... lags-for-minecraft/
2.强烈建议切换至paper：https://papermc.io/downloads
Spigot/Paper自带的世界保存是最流畅的，其他插件只会运行非常“垃圾”的/save-all，对性能提升并无帮助（出处：
https://www.spigotmc.org/threads ... on%E2%9A%A1.283181/）
Note: If you use Multicraft or a plugin to run saves, STOP! They just run the very inefficient /save-all command.
Worldsave Lag: If you have lag spikes from Worldsave, you might consider Paper's lag-free saving.

只要你服务器没有什么经常断电，就不会出问题。
